recommended_degree: Ilmu Perpustakaan, Ilmu Perpustakaan dan Informasi, Ilmu Perpustakaan dan Informasi Islam, Ilmu Informasi dan Perpustakaan, Informasi, Perpustakaan & Kearsipan (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
* Serves all library users by assisting with reference inquiries, operating the circulation desk according to the assigned schedule, and following routine procedures; performs other related duties as required.
* Catalogs and classifies library resources in accordance with library standards.
* Publishes and updates content on the library website, including book summaries, reviews, library news, and other relevant information.
* Uploads electronic resources to the libraryâ€™s repository system.
